ISSUE.TITLE: Add a reference to our premium support services to the system log pages
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Let's add the following information (hint) to the top of these two pages: 1. Admin area > system > Log 2. Admin area > system > View log entry details "Have questions or need help? Get dedicated support from the nopCommerce team with a guaranteed response within 24 hours. Please find more about our premium support services here." And "here" will point to: 1. The log list page - https://www.nopcommerce.com/nopcommerce-premium-support-services?utm_source=admin-panel&utm_medium=menu&utm_campaign=premium_support&utm_content=log-list 2. 1. The log ddetails page - https://www.nopcommerce.com/nopcommerce-premium-support-services?utm_source=admin-panel&utm_medium=menu&utm_campaign=premium_support&utm_content=log-details

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5207 Display Yes/No as value for some bool properties on the admin area

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5224 from badijm/5113-link-to-support #5213 Add links to List & Details pages of LogController.
#5213 Further changes to add reference to premium support on log pages
#5213 fixed PremiumSupportServices link (cherry picked from commit a5bab6785787f0fa13547cfa3a783ed43d9f0306)
